titleStmt.title: The prisoners complaint to the King's Most Excellent Majestie, or,The cries of the Kings Bench with advice to the disconsolate gentlemen-prisoners in the several prisons of England especially the Kings bench / by S.S., a fellow of Kings Colledge in Southwark.
titleStmt.author: Speed, Samuel, 1631-1682.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Speed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
